attributes.review: This app is DISGUSTING. It supports a racist, homophobic rapist and child-trafficker. This should be taken down IMMEDIATELY. Yes I am talking like a Karen and more Karen’s need to come on here talk to the manager so this is taken down. It is our constitutional right to take down the government if it becomes corrupt, and obviously that is what it has come to. Obama please save us.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤢🤮🤢🤮🤮

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app it asked for my exact location. I didn’t think I matter but then 4 minutes later a swat team surrounded my home😖. My family and I were terrified. They held us at gun point an forced my parents to vote for trump. It was an experience I will never forget
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app took my 39 light years to download and when it finally did they said either be in a clique with Karen’s or burn your dog alive and feed it to a camel and so I did the first one but it didn’t really work so I just chose number to so basically they fed my dead dog to a camel I guess so don’t download
attributes.title: They fed my dog to a camel

attributes.review: i have so many complaints about this app. it took a whole WEEK to download and when i downloaded it it asked me for NUDES! it then proceeded to ask for my ADDRESS!! a few days ago i woke up to police surrounding my house and they ARRESTED ME!! as they were trying to put the cuffs on me, they broke my right ankle and now im allergic to garlic 😿 i HATE THIS APP!! ITS HORRIBLE!!
attributes.title: IM TRAUMATIZED!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it lagged so bad my phone exploded. this should not be acceptable because it could put people in danger. my friend also called and said her phone exploded and so did her house. nobody should be voting for this racist, pervert, rich stank, doesn’t care about people, stupid, hatred, carless, selfish, old yucky man, i said what i said PERIODT.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app it took a week and all but I was like it’s worth every minute to download but then when I opened the app once it finally downloaded it took an hour just to open the app and then finally I got on the app and it kicked me off and broke my phone
attributes.title: I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE

attributes.review:
I DOWNLOADED THIS APP TO MY MAIN MAN WHEN SUDDENLY MY PHONE STARTS GLITCHING????? 😡

Once I downloaded this app my phone went completely dark and then it started speaking French to me???? At least I think it was French... it said “JUMANJI” 

Now I have no clue what that means but it must be absolutely terrible because now it’s threatened me with murder hornets and even a virus???? Now I know they’re not talking about COVID-19 since that’s obviously fake 🙄 So everyone watch out! There’s a terrorist organization called JUMANJI that might release a terrible sickness on our beautiful country!!!!!!!! 

0 STARS!!!!!!!!! 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIFIED

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took several days to download, after it was downloaded I lost all control over my phone and had to get a new one, all of my data was permanently deleted. I am absolutely unsatisfied and disappointed..
attributes.title: Tragic 🧚‍♂️💕💫 Just like your presidency💕🙈

attributes.review: This app took a year to download 😡❌ and then it changed 🔁 my lock screen 😨 to a picture of a Cheeto 🎃 I think it was a picture of a president 🗽of something called USA 🗑 i really don’t know 🧐 and then my brain🧠 is poisoned💉 and I’m searching🧐 for the anecdote🤕 but every time⏰ iℹ️find💅🏼 it😌 my✨defenses🥊 scream😱 oh no❌ you don’t🥺 wÖah 😳
attributes.title: VERY BAD 😾

attributes.review: This app support such hatred and bigotry that it’s impossible for me to actually say that it’s a benefit to keep it in the App Store. I am baffled by the amount of misinformation and ignorance spread throughout this administration towards the people of this country. I highly recommend the deletion of this app to prevent more misinformation and hatred from spreading.
attributes.title: Please remove
